description:
Take off and land on more than 10.000 real airports all over the world. Choose one of 7 different airplanes to start your journey with. 
Discover Norway, the Andes or Tanzania. Sky is the limit!

Features
Real Satellite Imagery: WWFS uses satellite images to create a realistic representation of the earth. 
No Limits: Fly over the Rocky Mountains, Japan, the Alps, or any place else. You can explore the whole world with the WWFS!
Ultimate Freedom: Take off wherever you want. Land your plane on any airport you want. You choose where you are going!
More Than 10.000 Airports: Innsbruck, Salt Lake City or Cape Town. Start your journey from one of 10.000 real airports worldwide.
Start Exploring Now!
name: WorldWide FlightSimulator
intro: Did you ever had the dream to explore the world from multiple thousand feet above? Then take off in the WorldWide FlightSimulator and experience unlimited freedom!
